mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.hf_name, product_desc, p.category_id, p.file_id, h.hf_name category_name, i.stone_id, p.brand_id, p.last_modifier, p.modify_time FROM product p LEFT JOIN hf_category h ON p.category_id = h.id left JOIN product_instance i on p.id=i.product_id

SELECT p.id, p.hf_name, product_desc, p.category_id, p.file_id, h.hf_name category_name, i.stone_id, p.brand_id, p.last_modifier, p.modify_time FROM product p LEFT JOIN hf_category h ON p.category_id = h.id left JOIN product_instance i on p.id=i.product_id where p.category_id=#{cagetoryId}

SELECT p.id, p.hf_name, product_desc, p.category_id, p.file_id, h.hf_name category_name, i.stone_id, p.brand_id, p.last_modifier, p.modify_time FROM product p LEFT JOIN hf_category h ON p.category_id = h.id left JOIN product_instance i on p.id=i.product_id where p.id=#{productId}

SELECT p.id, p.hf_name, product_desc, p.category_id, p.file_id, h.hf_name category_name, i.stone_id, p.brand_id, p.last_modifier, p.modify_time FROM product p LEFT JOIN hf_category h ON p.category_id = h.id left JOIN product_instance i on p.id=i.product_id where i.stone_id=#{stoneId}

SELECT p.id, p.hf_name, product_desc, p.category_id, p.file_id, h.hf_name category_name, i.stone_id, p.brand_id, p.last_modifier, p.modify_time FROM user_product_collect u LEFT JOIN product p ON u.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN hf_category h ON p.category_id = h.id LEFT JOIN product_instance i ON p.id = i.product_id WHERE u.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT p.id, p.hf_name, product_desc, p.category_id, p.file_id, h.hf_name category_name, i.stone_id, p.brand_id, p.last_modifier, p.modify_time FROM seniority_instance s LEFT JOIN hf_goods g ON s.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN product p ON g.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN hf_category h ON p.category_id = h.id LEFT JOIN product_instance i ON p.id = i.product_id WHERE s.seniority_id =#{seniorityId}
